title: PicoWorker
description: It is my first complete website. Here are some features of my project:
features: This is a micro-task & earning platform where users can do some micro tasks & earn money.
This website has three user roles: Worker, Task Creator, and Admin.
This website has a Stripe-based payment system, so Task Creators can buy coins (website currency) & Workers can withdraw their earned coins.

title: Helping Hand
description: It is a food donation website. Here are some features of my project:
features: This is a donation platform where donators can donate food & users can apply for needed food.
Donators can edit & delete their donated food data. Also, users can see the donated food with sorting & searching options.
Includes a map, animations, and a donation chart to improve UI/UX.

title: TourSpot
description: It is a tourism website. Here are some features of my project:
features: This is a tourism platform where users can explore popular tourist spots with detailed information.
Users can create and manage their itineraries.
Users can sort the spots by country & price. Also, animations and a user-friendly interface enhance UX.
